column5: Any good site mash sites someone could recommend for looking for boats in the US. So far I have used www. jaxed.com with good results but I was hoping for some other sites. thanks

I found my last 2 boats on jaxed - it is a good site. There is a real nice nitro 750 for 7500 in Rhode Island now if u r looking at a small bass boat. There is also a brand new crestliner fish hawk 1600 (50 hp 4 stroke) tiller for sale at 12500, which is a great deal too. Landry
